text:
Contorion GmbH | Business Intelligence Analyst | Berlin | Onsite | Full Time

We are an e-commerce startup for working tools, founded in 2014 and acquired in 2017, with currently around 200 employees from which 6+4 are in BI and Data Science.

We are looking for a BI Analyst to support our team in the maintenance of our data warehouse and the promotion of a data-driven approach across all departments. The new team member would join a highly successful team, who influences great decisions within the company.

Here is the job ad: https://www.contorion.de/jobs/detail/30013?lang=en

If interested get in touch here or drop a line to jobs@contorion.de
